about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for Ale & Tale Tavern includes all the musical tracks, SONGS, and the game's trailer music. Anyone can play this music at any time and throw a themed fantasy party.

We wrote 10 songs, recorded them with amazing performers specifically for the game, and they tell stories from the game. In them, you'll recognize your own adventures and the characters you will encounter.

Musically, the soundtrack is filled with the spirit of fantasy adventures, featuring both rousing battle themes and gentle tunes perfect for sitting by the campfire with friends. You'll dive into an epic story of the battle between good and evil while also hearing the tale of the Hermit who utterly lacks culinary talent. You'll hear slow melodies about a sad mermaid, as well as the story of the smartest cow in the world. And much more!
